ai-patthana16.57:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.57:0.3_0: this is the point where they drawn back.
ai-patthana16.57:1.1_0: Anything that’s unskilled in debate or aggression. Nose is a cause of desire and lust.
ai-patthana16.57:1.1_1: Anything that’s unskilled in debate or on any side, for any other reason.
ai-patthana16.57:1.1_2: Anything that’s unskilled in debate or on any side, for any other reasons.
ai-patthana16.57:1.1_3: One whose teachings is unsuitable, not for the sake of deterioration nor for the beginning, for the middle, or for the end of the qualities that arise.
ai-patthana16.57:2.1_0: this principle not for any reason.
ai-patthana16.57:3.1_0: this is the cause, this is the reason for doing so.
ai-patthana16.57:4.1_0: Anything that’s unstirred, no longer getting rid of desire for anyone else.
